comment._content: The flag on the left could be a Finnish flag? EDIT: Actually, looking at this picture, the man on the left could be Prince Carl of Sweden...?

comment.author: 45922963@N00
comment._content: The flag is a Sweden-Norway Union Flag The Union between Sweden and Norway , was the union of the kingdoms of Sweden and Norway between 1814 and 1905, when they were united under one monarch in a personal union, following the Treaty of Kiel, the declaration of Norwegian independence from Denmark, a brief war with Sweden, the Convention of Moss, on August 14, 1814, and the Norwegian constitutional revision of November 4, 1814. On the same day, the Norwegian parliament elected the Swedish king Charles XIII king of Norway. www.absoluteastronomy.com/topics/Union_between_Sweden_and...
